name: TriKonnect Technologies
description:
Experts in Mobile Application Development for iOS & Android, eCommerce solutions using Magento, SharePoint Services and Web Development, we are a cohesive set of people who have excelled in the areas of Web and Mobile.
We are rated as one of the few companies that have crafted mobile applications in the areas of iOS & Android platforms with superior user experience that brings more life to the otherwise flooded app market.
TriKonnect, a company focused into web and mobile, offers UI Design, Mobile Application Development in iOS & Android, Hybrid Apps using IONIC, eCommerce Application Development , SharePoint Services and Web Application Development for CMS like Magento and WordPress.
READ MORE...
